page.title: 08CREATION OF NATURE RESERVE 2
page.content:
The nettles grow very fast so we borrowed two goats to eat them but they liked the leaves on the trees better. They were great fun and loved to have the children visit them every day. It was not a success in getting rid of the nettles!
We have also cleared a patch about 1Om by 1Om and dug out a pond. Mr. Keys, one of our school govenors helped us and he gave us enough sand to line it. The P.T.A. have bought a thick plastic sheet to make the pond.
We are all busy finding out what plants and fish will be suitable for this sight.
We found a nest of hedgehogs, mother and five babies but we were careful not to disturb them.
